Package controller

Class MainForm

java.lang.Object
controller.MainForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class for the MainForm scene.

    • OnMainProductsDeleteButtonAction

      public void OnMainProductsDeleteButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes a selected product. Ensures that the product does not have any associated parts and prompts the user to confirm product deletion.

      actionEvent -

    • OnMainFormProductSearch

      public void OnMainFormProductSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
